00051 class F3_MailformPlusPlus_Interceptor_IPBlocking extends F3_MailformPlusPlus_AbstractInterceptor {
00052 
00059         protected $reportTable = 'tx_mailformplusplus_reportlog';
00060 
00067         protected $logTable = 'tx_mailformplusplus_log';
00068 
00076         public function process($gp,$settings) {
00077                 $this->gp = $gp;
00078                 $this->settings = $settings;
00079 
00080 
00081                 $ipTimebaseValue = $this->settings['ip.']['timebase.']['value'];
00082                 $ipTimebaseUnit = $this->settings['ip.']['timebase.']['unit'];
00083                 $ipMaxValue = $this->settings['ip.']['threshold'];
00084 
00085                 $this->check($ipTimebaseValue,$ipTimebaseUnit,$ipMaxValue,true);
00086 
00087                 $globalTimebaseValue = $this->settings['global.']['timebase.']['value'];
00088                 $globalTimebaseUnit = $this->settings['global.']['timebase.']['unit'];
00089                 $globalMaxValue = $this->settings['global.']['threshold'];
00090 
00091                 $this->check($globalTimebaseValue,$globalTimebaseUnit,$globalMaxValue,true);
00092 
00093                 return $this->gp;
00094         }
00095 
00105         private function check($value,$unit,$maxValue,$addIPToWhere = false) {
00106                 $timestamp = $this->getTimestamp($value,$unit);
00107                 $where = 'crdate >= '.$timestamp;
00108                 if($addIPToWhere) {
00109                         $where = 'ip=\''.t3lib_div::getIndpEnv('REMOTE_ADDR').'\' AND '.$where;
00110                 }
00111                 $res = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_SELECTquery('uid,ip,crdate,params',$this->logTable,$where);
00112 
00113                 if($res && $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_num_rows($res) >= $maxValue) {
00114 
00115                         $message = 'You are not allowed to send more mails because form got submitted too many times ';
00116                         if($addIPToWhere) {
00117                                 $message .= 'by your IP address ';
00118                         }
00119                         $message .= 'in the last '.$value.' '.$unit.'!';
00120                         if($this->settings['report.']['email']) {
00121                                 while($row = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_fetch_assoc($res)) {
00122                                         $rows[] = $row;
00123                                 }
00124                                 $intervalValue = $this->settings['report.']['interval.']['value'];
00125                                 $intervalUnit = $this->settings['report.']['interval.']['unit'];
00126                                 $send = true;
00127                                 if($intervalUnit && $intervalValue) {
00128                                         $intervalTstamp = $this->getTimestamp($intervalValue,$intervalUnit);
00129                                         $where = 'pid='.$GLOBALS['TSFE']->id.' AND crdate>'.$intervalTstamp;
00130                                         if($addIPToWhere) {
00131                                                 $where .= ' AND ip=\''.t3lib_div::getIndpEnv('REMOTE_ADDR').'\'';
00132                                         }
00133 
00134                                         $res_log = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_SELECTquery('uid',$this->reportTable,$where);
00135 
00136                                         if($res_log && $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_num_rows($res_log) > 0) {
00137                                                 $send = false;
00138                                         }
00139                                 }
00140                                 if($send) {
00141                                         if($addIPToWhere) {
00142                                                 $this->sendReport('ip',$rows);
00143                                         } else {
00144                                                 $this->sendReport('global',$rows);
00145                                         }
00146                                 } else {
00147                                         F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('alert_mail_not_sent');
00148                                 }
00149                         }
00150                         $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_free_result($res);
00151                         t3lib_div::devLog('IP blocker caught possible spamming on page '.$GLOBALS['TSFE']->id.'!','mailformplusplus',2,unserialize($row['params']));
00152                         if($this->settings['redirectPage']) {
00153                                 $this->doRedirect($this->settings['redirectPage']);
00154                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('redirect_failed');
00155                                 exit(0);
00156                         } else {
00157                                 throw new Exception($message);
00158                         }
00159                 }
00160         }
00161 
00168         private function doRedirect($emailRedirect) {
00169 
00170                 //if redirect_page was page id
00171                 if (is_numeric($emailRedirect)) {
00172 
00173                         // these parameters have to be added to the redirect url
00174                         $addparams = array();
00175                         if (t3lib_div::_GP("L")) {
00176                                 $addparams["L"] = t3lib_div::_GP("L");
00177                         }
00178 
00179                         $url = $this->cObj->getTypoLink_URL($emailRedirect, '',$addparams);
00180 
00181                         //else it may be a full URL
00182                 } else {
00183                         $url = $emailRedirect;
00184                 }
00185 
00186                 //correct the URL by replacing &amp;
00187                 if ($this->settings['correctRedirectUrl']) {
00188                         $url = str_replace('&amp;', '&', $url);
00189                 }
00190 
00191                 if($url) {
00192                         header("Location: ".t3lib_div::locationHeaderUrl($url));
00193                 }
00194         }

00203         private function sendReport($type,&$rows) {
00204                 $email = t3lib_div::trimExplode(',',$this->settings['report.']['email']);
00205                 $sender = $this->settings['report.']['sender'];
00206                 $subject = $this->settings['report.']['subject'];
00207                 $message = '';
00208                 if($type == 'ip') {
00209                         $message = 'IP address "'.t3lib_div::getIndpEnv('REMOTE_ADDR').'" has submitted a form too many times!';
00210                 } else {
00211                         $message = 'A form got submitted too many times!';
00212                 }
00213 
00214                 $message .= "\n\n".'This is the URL to the form: '.t3lib_div::getIndpEnv('TYPO3_REQUEST_URL');
00215                 if(is_array($rows)) {
00216                         $message .= "\n\n".'These are the submitted values:'."\n\n";
00217                         foreach($rows as $row) {
00218                                 $message .= date("Y/m/d h:m:i",$row['crdate']).":\n";
00219                                 $message .= 'IP: '.$row['ip']."\n";
00220                                 $message .= 'Params:'."\n";
00221                                 $params = unserialize($row['params']);
00222                                 foreach($params as $key=>$value) {
00223                                         if(is_array($value)) {
00224                                                 $value = implode(',',$value);
00225                                         }
00226                                         $message .= "\t".$key.': '.$value."\n";
00227                                 }
00228                                 $message .= '---------------------------------------'."\n";
00229                         }
00230                 }
00231 
00232                 //init mailer object
00233                 require_once(PATH_t3lib.'class.t3lib_htmlmail.php');
00234                 $emailObj = t3lib_div::makeInstance('t3lib_htmlmail');
00235                 $emailObj->start();
00236 
00237                 //set e-mail options
00238                 $emailObj->subject = $subject;
00239                         
00240                 $emailObj->from_email = $sender;
00241                         
00242                 $emailObj->setPlain($message);
00243                         
00244                 //send e-mails
00245                 foreach($email as $mailto) {
00246 
00247                         $sent = $emailObj->send($mailto);
00248                         if($sent) {
00249                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('mail_sent',$mailto);
00250                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('mail_sender',$emailObj->from_email,false);
00251                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('mail_subject',$emailObj->subject,false);
00252                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('mail_message',$message,false);
00253                         } else {
00254                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('mail_not_sent',$mailto);
00255                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('mail_sender',$emailObj->from_email,false);
00256                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('mail_subject',$emailObj->subject,false);
00257                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('mail_message',$message,false);
00258 
00259                         }
00260                 }
00261                 $dbParams = array();
00262                 $dbParams['pid'] = $GLOBALS['TSFE']->id;
00263                 if($type == 'ip') {
00264                         $dbParams['ip'] = t3lib_div::getIndpEnv('REMOTE_ADDR');
00265                 }
00266                 $tstamp = time();
00267                 $dbParams['tstamp'] = $tstamp;
00268                 $dbParams['crdate'] = $tstamp;
00269                 $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_INSERTquery($this->reportTable,$dbParams);
00270         }
00271 
00279         private function getTimestamp($value,$unit) {
00280                 $now = time();
00281                 $convertedValue = 0;
00282                 switch($unit) {
00283                         case "days":
00284                                 $convertedValue = $value * 24 * 60 * 60;
00285                                 break;
00286                         case "hours":
00287                                 $convertedValue = $value * 60 * 60;
00288                                 break;
00289                         case "minutes":
00290                                 $convertedValue = $value * 60;
00291                                 break;
00292                 }
00293                 return $now-$convertedValue;
00294         }
00295 
00296 }
